full_text:
Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054
From
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)] Charisma Edge, [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
To
Lamine N'Diaye, [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] Shirley V. Skipper-Scott [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] NYM/Executive Staff
Date 2019/07/26 10:10
Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Good morning all,
Epstein's attorneys are trying to get him his CPAP machine per our request. Can we have them hand-deliver it to medical staff as we have in previous instances?
Thank you,
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
>>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]@gmail.com> 7/26/2019 9:50 AM >>>
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]
Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine?  If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm.
Thank you.
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)] Esq.
810 Seventh Ave., Ste. 620
New York, NY 10019
646-801-[b(6); (b)(7)(C)]

text_blocks.content:
Good morning all,
Epstein's attorneys are trying to get him his CPAP machine per our request. Can we have them hand-deliver it to medical staff as we have in previous instances?
Thank you,

>>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]@gmail.com> 7/26/2019 9:50 AM >>>
Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine?  If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm.

additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions of personal information marked as [b(6); (b)(7)(C)]. The email discusses arrangements for delivering a CPAP machine to Jeffrey Epstein.
